description.value:
Once known as Lord of the Dead, Saloth is the Fury of death and murder. Saloth was once a reaper of souls in service to the Dusktide Lord, but he was seduced by Manseryon.

Edicts: Murder those who stand in your way, poison your weapons, destroy undead.

Anathema: Create undead, serve Brith or Uthanoda, show mercy to your foes.

Areas of Concern: Murder, wrath, revenge.
